title: chipbased cards
extract: A chip card is a standard-size plastic debit card or credit card which contains an embedded microchip as well as a traditional magnetic stripe. ... Chip cards also are known as smart cards, chip-and-pin cards, chip-and-signature cards, and Europay, MasterCard, Visa (EMV) cards.Jun 17, 2018
extract_html: A chip card is a standard-size plastic debit card or credit card which contains an embedded microchip as well as a traditional magnetic stripe. ... Chip cards also are known as smart cards, chip-and-pin cards, chip-and-signature cards, and Europay, MasterCard, Visa (EMV) cards.Jun 17, 2018
